website_summaries.verdict: This is a simple product that really works for all skin types to refresh and hydrate face with a gentle and pleasant mist.

product_meta.title: Evian Facial Spray, 10.1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Explore the many uses of Evian Natural Mineral Water Facial Spray. Evian Facial Spray is the only facial spray that is sealed at the source with Evian water's unique mineral content, so you can be confident that it's completely pure. Propelled by ozone-friendly nitrogen, Evian Facial Spray's ultra-fine micro droplet mist delivers an unparalleled boost of natural hydration without using any harsh chemicals. Evian Facial Spray can be used to hydrate skin during your skincare routine, blend and set makeup, refresh skin throughout the day, and soothe sensitive skin.

BRAND STORY
Evian Facial Spray contains pure, natural Evian water. Unlike other sprays, Evian Facial Spray provides an ultra-fine micro droplet mist that allows the upper layers of skin to absorb the hydrating Evian water.
